Daklab: 
It seems that on every blog, forum, etc. there will always be a dumb jerk such as yourself to pick on people for no goddamned reason or right... up until now i have always bought the original of a game if i liked it... i just prefer to download the game 1st for 3 reasons: 

1. Most game do not deserve to be bought, i download a game and check it out, if i like it, i will always buy the original to support the developers... however if i didnt like it il just move onto the next game assuming i have time for it...
2. Its hard to buy originals here in Romania... lets say that all the games that came out in US or Europe this week, will only reach the shelves of our shops here in maybe 6-8 months if were lucky... im not that patient...

3. I have 2 5yo boys and if im not able to make copies or download a game it would mean il have to hand them the original CD/DVD... lets get real here... 2 5yo boys + Original CD/DVD = one scratched and maybe even destroyed CD/DVD... so no thank you...

As for the calling me a thief part... dude... do you know where you are? thats right youre on www.piratebay.org... were ALL thieves here mate... otherwise there wouldnt be any reason for you to be here now would there? like it or not YOU are a thief just like the rest of us.. judging by your comment id say youre a dumb one too thinking youre o so high and mighty superior... some of us will decide to buy the original to support the developers and some wont, thats piracy for ya... in conclusion: please do us all a favour and judge yourself before judging others would ya? thank you.
